# karma 自动化 runner 集成 PhantomJS 无刷新

需要安装的东西


yarn add karma 

yarn add karma-cli --dev

yarn add karma-chrome-launcher --dev

yarn add karma-phantomjs-launcher --dev

yarn add karma-mocha --dev

yarn add karma-cha.....

yarn add karma-coverage --dev  (覆盖率)
